content: Can someone stop bors in #6694? I think I have now a better strategy for the refactor but bors ignored me :frown:
I explained in the PR my idea, if you think it's not better of course just let bors do his job
There's a couple other PRs in the current batch, so maybe it's fine to let it merge and do the other refactoring after?
Ah ok, I have no idea how bors works :)

There's also a view here: https://app.bors.tech/repositories/24316

Hmm, I'm a little surprised that bors doesn't let delegated people cancel. You can also cancel by pushing commits to the PR. In this case I agree that it's fine to do the refactor in a followup PR. Usually once the PR is in staging we only cancel if we anticipate a build / lint failure.
